meanings.definition: The act of sending text messages electronically.
meanings.sent1: Texting is a convenient way to communicate quickly.
meanings.sent2: I received a texting from my friend asking to meet up.
meanings.sent3: My grandma tried texting for the first time and accidentally sent a message to the wrong person.
meanings.sent4: In a world where words travel at the speed of light, texting is the new norm.
meanings.sent5: The constant sound of texting notifications filled the room.

meanings.definition: A message sent via text message.
meanings.sent1: I sent a quick texting to remind my mom about dinner.
meanings.sent2: Her texting was short but sweet, wishing me good luck.
meanings.sent3: The lost phone kept receiving mysterious textings from an unknown number.
meanings.sent4: His heartfelt texting brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent5: The important texting contained all the details for the meeting.

meanings.definition: The practice of sending text messages.
meanings.sent1: Texting has become a common way to stay in touch with friends.
meanings.sent2: She prefers texting over calling because it's less intrusive.
meanings.sent3: The texting competition heated up as they tried to type faster than each other.
meanings.sent4: In the art of communication, texting has its own rhythm and style.
meanings.sent5: The art of texting involves crafting messages that convey emotions effectively.
